body_html:
Likely it's an issue about your Python install shipping with a slightly outdated version of OpenSSL. Sometimes upgrading Python version would help, sometimes it can be more nasty (you may need to build Python from source and link it to a specific version of OpenSSL).

So maybe it'd be cool if the model_urls used plain http if security here isn't an issue.
body_text:
Likely it's an issue about your Python install shipping with a slightly outdated version of OpenSSL. Sometimes upgrading Python version would help, sometimes it can be more nasty (you may need to build Python from source and link it to a specific version of OpenSSL).
So maybe it'd be cool if the model_urls used plain http if security here isn't an issue.
body:
Likely it's an issue about your Python install shipping with a slightly outdated version of OpenSSL. Sometimes upgrading Python version would help, sometimes it can be more nasty (you may need to build Python from source and link it to a specific version of OpenSSL).

So maybe it'd be cool if the `model_urls` used plain http if security here isn't an issue.
